basics.name: Roberto Santos Mazutti Kosmel
basics.label: Junior Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full-Stack developer focused on Next.js/React, Node.js/NestJS, and PostgreSQL. Hands-on experience supporting production deployment and operations on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3), plus troubleshooting and end-to-end delivery.

work.name: Blue Exams / The Mindville / MBA No Brainer
work.summary: Worked across multiple web products with a strong focus on delivery, production stability, and cloud operations support.
highlights: Built and maintained web applications with end-to-end ownership (frontend, backend, database).
Worked with PostgreSQL and Prisma/ORM flows, supporting maintenance and debugging routines.
Supported deployments and production operations on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3) and Linux, including Nginx and Docker-based workloads.

education.institution: Federal University of São Paulo (UNIFESP), São José dos Campos
Federal University of São Paulo (UNIFESP), São José dos Campos
